Texts.Eng: Just because hes a Hylotl, Dad is flipping out! It's not fair! Dennyx and I love one another! Who cares what species he is??? Dad insists that 'No Munari of mine is going to marry a good-for-nothing Hylotl' but we'll show him! I just paid 20,000 pixels to the Closed Fist to 'take care' of our problem in the traditional manner. Our wedding will proceed as planned, no matter what!
